text: ewita owhu eya ragena senangata peratuwa giyaha. 7 samindanan wahanse joshuwata mese wadala seka: ”ma moses samanga wada sitiyak men numbaa samanga da wada sitina bawa siyalu ishrayelwarun danaganu pinisa owunge as idiriyehi numbaa usas kirimata da ada dawase mama patan gannemi. 8 numbaa giwisum karanduwa usulagena yana pujakawarunta katha kota, ‘oba hama jordan gange diya addarata pamini wita ehi nawathi sitinna’ kiya ana karanna.” 9 ewita joshuwa ishrayel janaya amathamin, ”mehi pamina obe dewi samindanan wahanse wadala deta sawan denna”yi kiwe ya. 10 ohu thawaduratath mese kiwe ya: ”jiwamana dewiyan wahanse oba athara sitina bawath, un wahanse noanumanawa ma oba idiriyen kananiwarun saha hiththiwarun da hiwiwarun saha perissiwarun da girgashiwarun saha amoriwarun da jebusiwarun da panna damana bawath oba meyin danagannahu ya. 11 balanna, mulu polowata adhipathi wana samindanan wahansege giwisum karanduwa oba peratuwen jordan gangata wadama karanu atha. 12 ebawin dan eka eka gothrayen ekkena bagin ishrayel gothrawalin pirimin dolosdeneku tho්raganna. 13 mulu polowata adhipathi wana samindanan wahansege giwisum karanduwa usulagena yana pujakawarun jordan gange diyehi pa thabu kenehi ma ihalin gala basina jalaya nathara wi godagahi sitinu atha.” 14 senanga jordan gangin etherata yannata thamange kudaramwalin nikma giya wita, giwisum karanduwa usulagena yana pujakawaru senangata peratuwen giyo ya. 15 giwisum karanduwa usulagena giya pujakawaru jordan gangata pamina diyehi pa thabu ha.
